name: Monkey Match 3
description:
This game consists of an experimental prototype for a short game.

Goal: Match 3 in a row to get the highest score possible without running out of time.

Controls:

* Grip or trigger to grab.

* Grab the gems and move them to swap them.

* Grab the monkey bars and move your hands to move.

This game was made for a class at the University of Utah known as "Experimental Gameplay", which challenges students to make short games with unique mechanics using a gamejam-like format. The prompt for this game was "Match 3 with a Twist". I decided to experiment with what it would take to make Match 3 games interesting in VR.
